title: Ep 188: Talking Skincare with Tina Craig, a.k.a. @bagsnob
itunes:title: Ep 188: Talking Skincare with Tina Craig, a.k.a. @bagsnob
itunes:subtitle: Jess and Jenn interview Tina Craig, the founder of Bag Snob and U Beauty. She reveals the beauty products in her bag, shares five fashion must-haves everyone needs, and tells us why her U Beauty serum is the one product to replace all others. Plus, Jen...
description:
Jess and Jenn interview Tina Craig, the founder of Bag Snob and U Beauty. She reveals the beauty products in her bag, shares five fashion must-haves everyone needs, and tells us why her U Beauty serum is the one product to replace all others. Plus, Jenn and Jess share New Year’s resolutions from listeners—and their own goals for 2020. Also in this episode: K-beauty, J-beauty, skincare, lasers, retinol, hyaluronic acid, concealer, perfume, fashion tips, beauty tips, children’s hair-lice tips (!), and more.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
